QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Eyelid lift
QAPair.Answer: Eyelid lift surgery is done to repair sagging or drooping upper eyelids ( ptosis ) and remove excess skin from the eyelids. The surgery is called ptosis repair and blepharoplasty. Sagging or drooping eyelids occur with increasing age. Some people are born with droopy eyelids or develop a disease that causes eyelid drooping.
